content.json:
## FortiNDR Cloud workbook
---
>**NOTE:** This workbook uses a parser based on a Kusto Function to normalize fields. [Follow these steps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/master/Solutions/Fortinet%20FortiNDR%20Cloud/Parsers/Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud.md) to create the Kusto function alias **Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud**.

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsSuricata_CL'
| where su_timestamp between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| summarize Count=count() by su_sig_category
content.title: Suricata Counts By Category

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsObservation_CL'
| where ob_timestamp between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| summarize Count=count() by ob_observation_title
content.title: Observation Counts by Title

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsDetections_CL'
| where de_created between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| summarize Count = count() by de_severity
content.title: Detection Counts by Severity

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsDetections_CL'
| where de_created between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| summarize Count = count() by de_confidence
content.title: Detection Counts by Confidence

parameters.name: Category
parameters.query:
FncEventsSuricata_CL
| summarize by alert_category_s
| order by alert_category_s asc
parameters.label: Signature Category

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsSuricata_CL'
| where su_timestamp between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where isempty('{Category}') or (su_sig_category == '{Category}')
| summarize Count=count() by su_sig_category, bin(su_timestamp, 1d)

parameters.name: Category
parameters.query:
FncEventsSuricata_CL
| summarize by alert_category_s
| order by alert_category_s asc
parameters.label: Signature Category

parameters.name: Name
parameters.label: Signature Name
parameters.query:
FncEventsSuricata_CL
| summarize by alert_signature_s
| order by alert_signature_s asc

parameters.name: SensorID
parameters.label: Sensor ID
parameters.query:
FncEventsSuricata_CL
| summarize by sensor_id_s
| order by sensor_id_s asc

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsSuricata_CL'
| where  su_timestamp between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where isempty('{Category}') or (su_sig_category == '{Category}')
| where isempty('{Name}') or (su_sig_name == '{Name}')
| where isempty('{SensorID}') or (su_sensor_id == '{SensorID}')
| project-away ob_*, de_*

parameters.name: Title
parameters.label: Observation Title
parameters.query:
FncEventsObservation_CL
| summarize by title_s
| order by title_s asc

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsObservation_CL'
| where ob_timestamp between({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where isempty('{Title}') or (ob_observation_title == '{Title}')
| summarize Count = count() by ob_observation_title,  bin(ob_timestamp, 1d)

parameters.name: Title
parameters.label: Ovbservation Title
parameters.query:
FncEventsObservation_CL
| summarize by title_s
| order by title_s asc

parameters.name: Sensor_ID
parameters.query:
FncEventsObservation_CL
| summarize by sensor_id_s
| order by sensor_id_s asc

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsObservation_CL'
| where ob_timestamp between({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where ob_confidence in ({Confidence})
| where isempty('{Sensor_ID}') or (ob_sensor_id == '{Sensor_ID}')
| where isempty('{Title}') or (ob_observation_title == '{Title}')
| project-away su_*, de_*

parameters.name: Category
parameters.query:
FncEventsDetections_CL
| summarize by Category
| order by Category asc

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsDetections_CL'
| where de_created between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where de_severity in ({Severity})
| where isempty('{Category}') or (de_category == '{Category}')
| summarize Count = count() by de_severity,  bin(de_created, 1d)
| render barchart
content.title: Detection Counts by Severity

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsDetections_CL'
| where de_created between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where de_confidence in ({Confidence})
| where isempty('{Category}') or (de_category == '{Category}')
| summarize Count = count() by de_confidence,  bin(de_created, 1d)
| render barchart
content.title: Detection Counts by Confidence

parameters.name: Category
parameters.query:
FncEventsDetections_CL
| summarize by Category
| order by Category asc

parameters.name: RuleNames
parameters.query:
FncEventsDetections_CL
| summarize by name_s
| order by name_s asc

content.query:
Fortinet_FortiNDR_Cloud
| where Type == 'FncEventsDetections_CL'
| where de_created between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end})
| where de_severity in ({Severity})
| where de_confidence in ({Confidence})
| where de_rule_name in ({RuleNames})
| where isempty('{Category}') or (de_category == '{Category}')
| sort by de_created desc
| project-away su_*, ob_*
content.title: FNC Detection List
